name: Game of Thrones: Episode Three - The Sword in the Darkness
name_original: Game of Thrones: Episode Three - The Sword in the Darkness
description:
Game of Thrones: Episode Three - The Sword in the Darkness is an adventure game developed by Telltale Games. It came out on 24-03-2015. Telltale Games published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Game of Thrones: Episode Three - The Sword in the Darkness on PC and PlayStation 3.
